title: Arbitrary Rolls
preCommand: const uuid = 'Compendium.ed4e.manual-english.JournalEntry.LB0uwkC26dySBg4p.JournalEntryPage.69Mh0NpXfSTroFUG'; const page = await fromUuid(uuid); await Journal.show(page, {force: true});

steps.title: System Manual
steps.content: The different dice rolling options are described in the system manual. this one shows 'roll from journal'

steps.title: create fast rolling in journals
steps.content: It is possible to create arbitrary roll commands in a journal usin @Roll(/s 14)(falling damage).

steps.title: Roll steps via chat command
steps.content: In the chat window, it is possible to roll steps by using the command /s .

steps.title: Start a generic roll pop up
steps.content: By clicking on the dice symbol, a roll pop up appears, enabling you to roll any step and include karma and/or devotion
